description: Experts warn that Thanksgiving gatherings could contribute to the spread of the coronavirus. Driving is the best option if you need to travel.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Coronavirus vaccine researcher speaks out about promising UK effort
description: Professor Robin Shattock, who leads the development of one of the UK’s most promising coronavirus vaccine attempts, tells Richard Engel he’s confident a number of vaccine candidates will work well and could be available early next year.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Vatican report finds popes knew of sexual abuse allegations against ex-cardinal
description: According to a report released Tuesday, Popes Benedict XVI and John Paul II were aware of the allegations against former U.S. Cardinal Theodore McCarrick.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Trump pushes ahead with legal challenges, hasn’t conceded election
description: President Trump is pushing ahead with his legal challenges, not conceding the election he lost, and his administration is not moving ahead with typical transition tasks, something that is raising new concerns about national security.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Biden on Trump not conceding: It’s ‘an embarrassment’
description: President-elect Joe Biden made his first comments about President Trump not conceding the 2020 race on Tuesday and asserted that his transition plans would not be impacted.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Supreme Court indicates Obamacare could withstand challenge
description: It’s not clear how the Supreme Court will vote on the Affordable Care Act’s mandate, but at least five justices, a majority, indicated the rest of the law should remain intact.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: U.S. Covid-19 cases reach new high
description: A staggering 133,000 Americans were diagnosed with Covid-19 on Monday, and the number of daily fatalities is approaching 1,000.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Wearing a mask can protect you, not just others, new CDC guidance says
description: The CDC has said all year that wearing a mask can protect others from the coronavirus. New guidance from the agency says a mask can also reduce exposure to infectious droplets for the person wearing one.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Dr. Anthony Fauci speaks out on Pfizer vaccine, holiday Covid concerns
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci says the FDA could approve the Pfizer vaccine for emergency use in weeks and that he would take it. Fauci says every family will have to make a “risk assessment” about gatherings for Thanksgiving, though his family will celebrate over Zoom.
source.name: NBC News

author: Kanwal Syed and Elliott Ramos and Naitian Zhou
title: Graphic: Turnout per county in the battleground states
description: Out of 1,118 counties in battleground states in the 2020 presidential election, only 37 flipped, which meant control of the states rested largely on parties' turning out votes within counties they had won before.
content:
Voter turnout spiked this election in battleground states across the country.
Nearly every county in NBC News' 13 battleground states increased turnout from the 2016 election, according to an analys… [+3092 chars]
source.name: NBC News

author: Shari Uyehara
title: Wayfair's early Black Friday sales
description: The Wayfair Black Friday sale is coming early in 2020 and offering deals on furniture and home decor. Find the best deals on rugs, chairs, appliances and more.
content: Black Friday is still a couple weeks away but Wayfair and other retailers, from The Home Depot to Nordstrom and Macys, are offering early sales and deals to get you started. Wayfair is currently hold… [+3847 chars]

author: Tim Stelloh
title: Football game between Alabama and LSU delayed after players test positive for COVID-19
description: A matchup between two college football heavyweights scheduled for this weekend was postponed after players from Louisiana State University tested positive for coronavirus, school officials said.

title: 'Murder hornet' nest had potential to spawn almost 200 queens in Washington state
description: Scientists found nearly 200 queen hornets in the “murder hornet” nest that was successfully destroyed by Washington state agriculture officials in October.

author: NBCNews.com
title: From the archives, 1975: Edmund Fitzgerald sinks in Lake Superior
description: The freighter ship S.S. Edmund Fitzgerald sank in Lake Superior 45 years ago in 1975, killing 29 crew members. Watch Nightly News coverage from this day.
source.name: NBC News

author: David Ingram
title: A Twitter for conservatives? Parler surges amid election misinformation crackdown
description: Its embrace by prominent conservatives and a sudden influx hint at a once informal online dynamic that has recently become more official: the blue internet and the red internet.
content:
As Twitter labeled tweet after tweet from President Donald Trump in recent days, some conservatives decided they'd had enough.

title: Masks don't just protect you from spreading Covid. They protect you from getting it, too, CDC says
description: "Adopting universal masking policies can help avert future lockdowns," the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said in a new report.
content: Wearing a mask not only protects others from the spread of Covid-19, but it protects the wearer as well, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Tuesday in its strongest messaging yet on … [+4351 chars]

title: I was on Trump's Covid task force. His transition antics are sabotaging the vaccine.
description: The Trump administration has stopped all transition activities and funding, and that will slow — if not completely halt — vaccination efforts.

title: President-elect Joe Biden calls Trump's failure to concede as 'an embarrassment'
description: The president-elect said he wasn't concerned about the administration's stonewalling. "We are already beginning the transition," Biden said.
